thread.title: Beau Chene crushed under STM onslaught
thread.title_full: Beau Chene crushed under STM onslaught

title: Beau Chene crushed under STM onslaught
text:
Beau Chene crushed under STM onslaught Bobby Ardoin 3:59 p.m. CDT October 10, 2015 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Beau Chene received an introduction in District 4-4A Friday with an inauspicious reception at St. Thomas More’s Cougar Stadium. 
STM scored 28 points in each of the first two quarters and then added another 17 in the second half to defeat Beau Chene 70-0. 
The loss was the second in six games for Beau Chene. STM improved to 5-1. 
It was the first district game for each team. 
STM rushed for 204 yards and passed for another 170. In the first half most of the Cougars’ scoring drivers were short and quick. None of the Cougars’ seven touchdowns consumed more than five plays and 55 yards. 
Beau Chene meanwhile had its difficulty moving the ball. 
The Gators didn’t attempt a pass. 
BCHS attempted 35 rushes for a net 39 yards. Savion Broussard led the Beau Chene runners with eight carries and 28 yards. 
Running back Jylan Henry gained 19 off 11 carries. 
Beau Chene didn’t help sustain any offensive consistency after losing all five fumbles. 
The STM rushing trio of Evan Trahan, Evan Dominque and Gabe Lebouef accounted for most of the Cougars’ ground yards. 
Trahan had 84, Trahan gained 54 and Lebouef ran eight times for 49. 
STM quarterback Will Bellamy threw eight times and completed six for 90. 
Bellamy threw a pair of first half touchdown passes. One of those was a 24-yarder to wide receiver Trevort Begue, while another came late in the second quarter on a 20-yard completion to Griffin Hebert. 
Begue also scored on a second quarter run of five yards, ending a quick two-play, 15-yard drive. 
The Gators provided the Cougars with another touchdown after Aaron Monrose scooped a fumble and returned it for a 14-yard score. 
NEXT WEEK: Beau Chene hosts Teurlings Catholic. Read or Share this story: http://www.dailyworld.com/story/sports/high-school/2015/10/10/beau-chene-crushed-stm-onslaught/73739366/ TOP VIDEOS
